attributes.action: GIVE A PUBLIC ASSURANCE that you will NOT be offering sanctuary and succour in this country to the three Nigerian female Boko Haram recruiters.
attributes.additional_details: These are three people who need to be treated in accordance with the law of their land.  We, in this country, suffer greatly from the hubris of David Cameron by having him offering sanctuary and succour to rampant criminal terrorists from all over the planet AND DO NOT WANT HIM TO BE INVITING THESE WOMEN TO THIS COUNTRY.  The people of this country have a right to be protected from international criminals and inviting them here at our expense is a violation of that right to protection.
